episodes.title: 6. The Remembrance
episodes.description:
We get an update on those who made it out of the organisation. But there’s one group of people left to hear from: Joy Morgan’s family. Will they finally agree to speak? Six years on, Joy's sister, Dionne, opens up about her missing sister.

Clip credits:
‘IUIC Under Attack in Kenya, Banned in France? | Bishop Nathanyel’ / Something Nice with Dinano / YouTube

Details of organisations offering information and support with missing persons are available at bbc.co.uk/actionline.

episodes.title: 5. The City of Hope
episodes.description:
Travelling to the U.S. in search of answers, a disturbing truth comes to light — one that could reframe everything we thought we knew.

Clip credits:
‘Bishop Nathanyel : Today's Men Who Hate Women, Diddy, Molestation, Resurrection, Hell and Temptation’ / I Never Knew Tv / YouTube
Our Ladies In Waiting Got Black Hebrew Israelites HATING! / IUIC FRIDAY NIGHT RAW / YouTube
Addressing The Scoffers About Joy Morgan / IUICintheClassRoom / YouTube

Listener note: This episode contains references to domestic violence and derogatory language used to describe women.

Details of organisations offering information and support with missing persons are available at bbc.co.uk/actionline.

episodes.title: 4. The Sisterhood
episodes.description:
The reality of being a woman in IUIC comes with a price. Some of these women are finally ready to speak – and their stories reveal the cost of obedience.

Clip credits:
‘CHRISTIAN DESTROYS IUIC CULT IN EXPLOSIVE SHOWDOWN vs ‪@iuicphoenix‬’ / VOCAB MALONE Street Apologist / YouTube
‘Debating GREAT MILL STONE HEBREW ISRAELITES in London UK’ / Vocab Malone / Instagram

Listener note: This episode contains strong language and themes of domestic violence and child abuse that some listeners may find distressing.

Details of organisations offering information and support with missing persons are available at bbc.co.uk/actionline.

episodes.title: 3. The Silence
episodes.description:
Six weeks after Joy goes missing, her case is finally reported to the police. But her disappearance is met with silence. Will Joy get the justice she deserves?

Clip credits:
Body of missing student Libby Squire recovered from Humber Estuary / ITV News / YouTube
‘The murder of Joy Morgan’ / BBC Newsbeat Documentaries / YouTube
Police 'extremely concerned' for missing 21-year-old student Libby Squire / ITV News / YouTube

Listener note: This episode contains strong language and themes of sexual abuse that some listeners may find distressing.

Details of organisations offering information and support with missing persons are available at bbc.co.uk/actionline.

episodes.title: 2. The Body
episodes.description:
When ex-members decide to speak out about the religious organisation, new discoveries are made about Joy’s position in IUIC and the man behind her murder.

Clip credits:
‘Bishop Nathanyel Returns: Sounds Off on 2819 Church, Ghana Mission & U.S. vs Iran Warnings’ / 3 Milli Productions / YouTube
‘GOD HATES INTERRACIAL MARRIAGE’ / IUIC St Louis / Facebook
Listener note: This episode contains strong language and themes of sexual abuse that some listeners may find distressing.

Details of organisations offering information and support with missing persons are available at bbc.co.uk/actionline.

episodes.title: 1 | The Disappearance
episodes.description: Joy Morgan’s life changes forever when she discovers IUIC, a Black Hebrew Israelite group, on YouTube. She becomes deeply involved in the congregation and begins to cut ties with the people around her. Then, one day, she vanishes. Clip credits: ‘Murdered midwifery student Joy Morgan speaking at event’ / Daily Mail World / YouTube ‘The murder of Joy Morgan’ / BBC Newsbeat Documentaries / YouTube “Nation is family Nation is community Nation is men leading by example Nation is women support Nation is children with role models Nation is unity Nation is you!” / IUIC Atlanta / Instagram Listener note: This episode contains references to death, murder and suicide that some listeners may find distressing.
